Posts.Content: Hey Blossom, I've been on anti-hormone meds for 2 1/2 years now. Arimidex specifically for about a month. Oddly, anti-depressants help with the side effects. I read this, asked about it, ... Most of us could us anti-depressants anyway, I can't understand why this extra use isn't spread around more. 'Luck
Posts.Title: Arimidex and breast swelling and tenderness.
